snippet: The German automaker said bubbles could form in the fuel systems of the affected vehicles, in the 2009-14 model years.
abstract: Volkswagen AG announces recall of 189,490 Tiguan small sport utility vehicles in North America, saying fuel system problem could cause vehicles from 2009-20014 model years to stall under certain weather conditions.
lead_paragraph: The German automaker said bubbles could form in the fuel systems of the affected vehicles, in the 2009-14 model years.

headline.main: VW Recalls S.U.V.s Over Stalling Issues
headline.print_headline: VW Recalls S.U.V.s Over Stalling Issues
